inclusion.criterion: female participant of girls' club in the school that was randomly selected to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: resides in the Upper Manya Krobo district
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: does not speak local dialect - Krobo
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: A 35-year-old woman with history of acne, hirsutism, and acromegaly. She has elevated testosterone levels and IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL.
